arts.sum: Birmingham recorded their biggest victory since returning to the Sky Bet Championship as three set-piece goals helped them to a 4-0 win over lacklustre Portsmouth.

arts.ttl: All 12 Championship weekend games predictions - Week 13
arts.sum:
Frank Lampard's Coventry kick off the weekend schedule knowing victory at Wrexham on Friday sends them six points clear at the top of the Championship — for 24 hours at least.

That is one of 12 matches in a full weekend Championship programme and here are our thoughts on all of them.

arts.ttl: Birmingham vs Portsmouth - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Championship clash between Birmingham City and Portsmouth, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Birmingham vs Portsmouth predictions: Pompey to hold Blues
arts.sum: Winning hasn’t come easy for either Birmingham or Portsmouth of late and Elliott Bretland expects the low-scoring duo to cancel each other out at St Andrew’s.
